First.short_description: Foundational truth or axiom from which other principles derive.

Organizing.short_description: Pattern or law that structures relationships and arrangements.

Governing.short_description: Rule or law that controls behavior or development of systems.

Causal.short_description: Pattern determining how causes produce effects in any domain.

Formative.short_description: Pattern that shapes development and manifestation of forms.

Operative.short_description: Pattern determining how processes and operations function.

Creative.short_description: Pattern governing how new forms and realities come into being.

Integrative.short_description: Pattern that unifies and harmonizes different elements.

Archetypal.short_description: Primordial pattern expressing fundamental nature of reality.

Universal.short_description: Pattern that operates consistently across all domains.

Metaphysical.short_description: Pattern governing fundamental nature of reality and being.

Logos.short_description: Pattern expressing divine reason and creative order.

Dialectical.short_description: Pattern of development through opposition and synthesis.

Cyclic.short_description: Pattern of recurring phases and transformations.

Hierarchical.short_description: Pattern organizing reality in graduated levels of manifestation.

Emanative.short_description: Pattern by which reality proceeds from higher to lower levels.

Transcendent.short_description: Pattern that operates beyond normal limitations.

Immanent.short_description: Pattern inherent within and pervading manifestation.

Recursive.short_description: Pattern that applies to itself at different scales.

Reflective.short_description: Pattern mirroring between different levels of reality.

Generative.short_description: Pattern producing new forms and manifestations.

Mediating.short_description: Pattern connecting different levels or domains.

Regulatory.short_description: Pattern maintaining balance and proper function.

Teleological.short_description: Pattern directing development toward specific ends.

Analogical.short_description: Pattern of correspondence between different domains.

Holistic.short_description: Pattern relating parts to wholes across reality.

Complementary.short_description: Pattern of mutual completion between opposites.

Resonant.short_description: Pattern of harmonic influence between similar forms.

Evolutionary.short_description: Pattern of progressive development and complexification.

Involutionary.short_description: Pattern of descent from higher to more limited states.

Equilibrial.short_description: Pattern maintaining dynamic balance in systems.

Synchronic.short_description: Pattern coordinating events and meanings in time.
